name: RETRO RUNNER (iLan_3)
description:
This is a finished prototype of a simple endless car runner game. Score as many points as you can. we will soon add more graphics, cinematics and leaderboard and other mechanics to the game. Game will also release in android after full development. 

We need funds to buy more graphical and audio assets since we are all coders, Hope for your support

Thanks, and Regards

SIMPLEMINDS LTD.

Care to provide your feedback in the comments
